headline: How PepsiCo Stays Ahead in Snacks and Beverages
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is one of the Best Wide Moat Dividend Stocks to Invest in. After years of weak growth caused by operational missteps and limited investment, PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP)’s management has successfully turned things around, delivering steady gains in revenue and profits. However, the company still has more room to grow, supported by strong […]
